Genderize setup

```{r}
tn<-c('   Raphaël^-#    Mcartan Fair    3Ждан 刘   ', "K8tlyn", 'StregA' )

x.df <- tibble::tibble(given=tn)
x.df %<>% mutate( given = stringi::stri_trans_general(given, id = "Latin-ASCII")) 
x.df %<>% mutate( given = stringr::str_squish(given) )
x.df %<>% mutate( given = stringr::str_to_lower(given) )
x.df %<>% mutate( given = stringr::str_replace_all(given,'\\s','-') )
x.df %<>% mutate( given = stringr::str_remove_all(given,'[\\digits\\W--\\-]'))

x.df %>% pull(given)
```
